name: Head North: The Inevitable
summary: A contemplative single-player first-person action game, you're thrust into a world where evading relentless enemies is your sole chance at survival. Your lifeline? A flawed survival kit. Prepare for a slow-paced, tension-filled experience as you navigate a challenging terrain.

videos.name: Teaser
videos.title: Head North: The Inevitable (Early Teaser Trailer 1)
